      • visit

        public void visit​(ActionStartMessage actionStartMessage)
        Controls the action starting. Use power up and reload are not counted as possible actions. Every player has 2 possible actions. Discard and spawn when the first turn of every player starts and when the player dies.
        Specified by:
        visit in interface MessageVisitor
        Parameters:
        actionStartMessage - for starting the action

      • visit

        public void visit​(ActionMessage actionMessage)
        Properly for the action that the player want to choose. Every player has two possible actions. Action items must be executed in order in every action, unless there will be an error message.
        Specified by:
        visit in interface MessageVisitor
        Parameters:
        actionMessage - for making the action

      • visit

        public void visit​(ActionEndMessage actionEndMessage)
        Controls the end of an action, if a player, whose turn finishes, try to do another move, error message.
        Specified by:
        visit in interface MessageVisitor
        Parameters:
        actionEndMessage - to end the action
